C

calculateNeighbours() - Method in class main.Panel
will calculate the bomb count by checking the neighbours of the panel
changeSize(int, int) - Static method in class main.Main
used to change the size of the current window.
checkWin() - Method in class main.Game
 
close() - Static method in class main.Main
for handling closing the window
confirm(Game) - Static method in class main.Menus
a window popup to confirm a setting change and asks if the player wants to restart the game to apply the settings
createGrid(int, int) - Method in class main.Layout
Creates a gridPane with the dimensions of length and height, and fills each grid section with a new Panel, and stores that panel in an array of panels.
createMenu(String[][]) - Method in class main.Layout
Creates a menuBar in the form of a MenuHandler
customGame(Game) - Static method in class main.Menus
Opens a new window to select a difficulty before creating a new game
